content: भोगिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भोग-इनि] {@--1@} Eating. {@--2@} Enjoying. {@--3@} Suffering, experiencing, enduring. {@--4@} Using, possessing (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in these four senses.) {@--5@} Having curves. {@--6@} Having hoods. {@--7@} Devoted to enjoyment, indulging in sensual pleassures; <ls>Pt. 1. 65</ls> (where it has sense 6 also). {@--8@} Rich, opulent. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A snake; गजाजिनालंबि पिनद्धभोगि वा <ls>Ku. 5. 78</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 32</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 48</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 7</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 59.</ls> {@--2@} A king. {@--3@} A voluptuary. {@--4@} A barber. {@--5@} The headman of a village; {@--6@} The lunar mansion आश्लेषा. --नी A woman belonging to the king's harem, but not consecrated with him, the concubine of a king.
